name: moss stitch in a square dishcloth
notes:
> **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase!
> [subscribe here][2]**

the moss stitch is my go-to stitch whenever i want to crochet something easy. 

i wrote this pattern for a dishcloth using the moss stitch, but this time it is worked in a square, similar to a granny square technique.

i think it looks so beautiful with multicolor yarn, but it will also look really good with a solid color.

the pattern is available for free on my blog.

return/refund policy: due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file, all sales are final.
